mapper.insert: insert into coupon_detail(user_id, co_id, enddate) values(#{user_id},${co_id},DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY))
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM `coupon_detail` cd JOIN `coupon` c ON cd.co_id = c.co_id

SELECT cd.user_id, c.c_name, c.c_discount, c.c_content, cd.startdate, cd.enddate, cd.usaged FROM `coupon_detail` cd JOIN `coupon` c ON cd.co_id = c.co_id
order by startdate desc
